duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and implement day-to-day operations of Family Support Services and Teen Program
Conduct outreach, in-home visits, and liaison between home and school for academic support
Connect families with local resources, including academic tutoring and study skills development
Recruit, assess needs, and support teens' learning and overall well-being
Plan, provide, and oversee afterschool and summer sessions for teens
Perform administrative tasks, organize activities, and supervise additional staff and volunteers
Occasional assistance with grant reports, grant writing, and translation/interpreting
